text.tspan: … but so is the quality of their local environment
Unit 20 'Capstone: Economics of the environment’ Section 20.10 'Policy choices matter' in The
CORE Team, The Economy. Available at https://tinyco.re/20102551 [Figure 20.25b]
GDP per capita in 2018 (PPP, constant 2011 international dollars)
Data source: Jaiteh et al. (2014), Maddison Project Database (2018)
Note: See the first part of the graph on: https://tinyco.re/3728563. Environmental Performance Indices are displayed on the 'MAP' tab.
